definitions.definition: Forgetfulness ; cessation of remembrance of wrong; oblivion .
An act of the sovereign power granting oblivion, or a general pardon , for a past offense , as to subjects concerned in an insurrection .

main_definition: Forgetfulness ; cessation of remembrance of wrong; oblivion .
secondary_definitions: An act of the sovereign power granting oblivion, or a general pardon , for a past offense , as to subjects concerned in an insurrection .
